text: FC Progress Kamensk-Shakhtinsky () is a Russian football team from Kamensk- Shakhtinsky. Currently it plays on amateur level in the Rostov Oblast league. It played professionally from 1963 to 1970 in the Soviet Second League, their best result was 3rd place in 1964. ==External links== * Team history by footballfacts Category:Association football clubs established in 1962 Category:Football clubs in Russia Category:Sport in Rostov Oblast Category:1962 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: FC Progress Kamensk-Shakhtinsky
